name: Kuro (vmu_)
description:
Kuro may contain disturbing imagery and content, play at your own risks. Story 

after a terrible incident, Kuro suffers from amnesia. A shrine appears in her head every night. Will she find the answer she seeks there?

Controls

Spacebar to Interact

Tab For Inventory

WASD For movement

[WASD] Walk [TAB] Inventory[Space] Interact/Continue Dialogue[SHIFT]
Walk but faster Developer Note

I made this game over a month, I'll definitely scope it a big smaller next time.
I was so happy to make this.  

Join our discord and say hi!! :  https://discord.gg/ttJyGXTny4
